mapper.select: SELECT M.USER_ID,M.GROUP_SEQ,C.GROUP_NAME,M.USER_PWD,M.NAME,M.PROFILE,R.ROLE_TYPE FROM MEMBER M LEFT OUTER JOIN ROLE R ON M.USER_ID = R.U_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CLASS C ON C.GROUP_SEQ = M.GROUP_SEQ WHERE M.USER_ID = #{id}
select count(*) from member where user_id = #{userId} and name = #{name}
mapper.insert: insert into member(USER_ID, USER_PWD, NAME, BIRTHDAY, GENDER, PHONE, ADDR1, ADDR2) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{name}, #{birthday}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{addr1}, #{addr2} )
mapper.update: update member set profile = #{profile} where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select group_seq from member where user_id= #{userId}
SELECT m.user_id,name,count(*) as count FROM member m JOIN task t ON m.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.status = 1 and m.group_seq = #{groupSeq} GROUP BY m.user_id, name ORDER BY m.name ASC

SELECT m.user_id, name, title, create_date FROM member m JOIN task t ON m.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.status = 0 and m.group_seq = #{groupSeq} GROUP BY m.user_id, name, title, create_date ORDER BY create_date desc
